body.name: Crucial Pro RAM 48GB Kit (2x24GB) DDR5 6000MT/s (or 5600MT/s or 5200MT/s or 4800MT/s) Desktop Memory CP2K24G60C48U5
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 4 hrs 19 mins
features: Downclock capable for systems that only support 5600, 5200 or 4800MT/s
Compatible with 12th Gen Intel Core or AMD Ryzen 7000 Series Desktop CPUs and above
Intel XMP 3.0 and AMD EXPO supported for easy performance recovery
Game at higher frame rates, multitask better, improve productivity
ECC type = non-ECC, form factor = UDIMM, pin count = 288-pin, PC speed = PC5-48000, voltage = 1.1V, rank and configuration = 1Rx8
body.description: CP2K24G60C48U5 is the Crucial 48GB kit consisting of (2) 24GB DDR5 Pro desktop module that operates at the speed of 6000MT/s and has a CAS Latency of 48. It is a UDIMM and conforms to the industry standard DDR5 UDIMM layout of 288 pins. It is compatible with systems that can take DDR5-6000 UDIMM memory.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 43 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Micron quality and reliability As one of only three global memory manufacturers, and with 45 years of memory expertise, Micron delivers cutting-edge engineering and superior component and module-level testing for all Crucial DRAM products. Only DDR5-enabled CPUs/motherboards support DDR5 memory. Not compatible with DDR4 motherboards.Crucial DDR5 desktop memory modules (UDIMMs) can reach rated speeds with Intel XMP 3.0 or AMD EXPO turned on in the UEFI/BIOS settings. Applicable for all Crucial DDR5 desktop memory (UDIMM) modules except Crucial DDR5-4800 desktop memory, which supports only Intel XMP 3.0. Based on published competitor specs for DDR5 memory as of August 2023. Altering clock frequency or voltage beyond advertised speeds and timing (overclocking) may result in damage to computer components. Micron disclaims any and all liability for such damage.DDR5 speeds are comparable to extreme-performance DDR4 memory speeds and, at 4,800MT/s, at least 1.5x faster than maximum standard DDR4 speeds of 3,200MT/s.Crucial DDR5 Pro Memory modules (UDIMMs) can only be installed in desktops/workstations built to support DDR5 DRAM, such as 12th and 13th Gen Intel Core and AMD Ryzen 7000 Series desktop processors.DDR5 data rate of 6,000MT/s transfers 1.88x the DDR4 data rate of 3,200MT/s.Under memory-intensive workloads, DDR5 can deliver up to 2x the bandwidth, per an internal simulation of dual ranked x8 modules in client platforms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive High Speed / Performance RAM
reviews.reviewText: I have been an IT professional for more than 20 years and obviously, I build my PCs. I also used and have been using Crucial products for many years and never had any issues. The Crucial products are known as they are good quality and affordable price range. Crucial Pro RAM 48GB Kit (2x24GB) DDR5 RAM kit is also proof of that. This is a high-end and very well-made RAM kit and the amount of the total RAM is weird. I am not complaining I just have never seen a 48 GB RAM kit before. I saw 4-8-16-32-64 but not 48 so that is new.If you are even a little bit familiar with computer hardware you will able to change your old RAMs with this Crucial kit. It is seriously a 1 minute job. Just before getting this RAM be sure that your mainboard supports DDR5 RAM modules. You do not really need to worry about 6000MT/s (or 5600MT/s or 5200MT/s or 4800MT/s) part. If your mainboard supports DDR5 it means you will get 4800MT/s for sure. That is the default clock speed for DDR5 RAMS. As you see this RAM supports 6000MT/s which is awesome for gamers or people like me who love high performance. Long story short this is a fantastic RAM kit and totally worth it for your money! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: RAM is great!! The jump from DDR4 to DDR5 definitely made a significant jump in performance, and this specific RAM was a great new product. I would say it’s expensive right now, but all DDR5 RAM is so expensive right now so I think the price is justifiable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Zero problems for about two months
reviews.reviewText: I installed this in my daughter's new computer that I helped her build, and put it on its fastest profile. That was two months ago, that computer is running nonstop (I think it has literally never been off and only restarts when Windows demands it), and everything is perfectly fine. There hasn't been a single hiccup with that entire computer, so this RAM is causing zero problems.It does get hot, but everything inside a computer tower is boiling these days. As long as it continues to function, I don't really care how hot it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Higher latency timings...
reviews.reviewText: 2023-10-05. RAM kit by Crucial. 48GB (2x24GB). DDR5. 6000MT/s. Downclock capable. XMP 3.0. EXPO. 1.1V. 1Rx8. Black.The boast about this latest RAM kit isn't so much the speeds as it is the power. The Crucial Pro DDR5-6000 memory kit boasts high bandwidth and low operating voltage.Using Micron integrated circuits (IC's) in printed circuit boards (PCB's), this RAM kit by crucial features a low profile design enrobed in a minimalist matte black aluminum heat spreader to cool it.The kit is also compatible with both Intel & AMD memory profiles provided the central processing units (CPU's) are DDR5-enabled. The appeal of this kit seems to be ability to start at a very low 1.1V, and reach much higher frequencies and/or lower timings without scaling to the 1.45V that many other kits do. The result is increased longevity due to lower operating temperatures.While they're not the fastest on the market at 6000MT/s, and operating at 1.1V is common for DDR-5, what isn't so common is putting the two together. DDR-5 kits typically operate a 1.1V when left at JEDEC 4800MT/s speed, so delivering 6000MT/s within the same power range is pretty noteworthy.Where this kit falls short is with latency. Timings are set at 48-48-48 which are by far no where near the best on the market today. A DDR5-4800 at CL38 has about 16ns latency, there should be no reason why this 6,000MT/s kit running at CL48 can't do the same delivering 48GB/s bandwidth (about 9.6GB more than the DDR5-4800.)Overall, as an out of the box kit, this set will serve you well provided you don't need low latency; however, if you do require tighter timings, there are better options out there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It works and that's what matters in the end. I'm no hard core gamer or overclocker but I do build many PCs every year. Swapping out memory is pretty much the single easiest upgrade you can make to your PC, so of course installation of this RAM is a breeze. A strange amount of RAM, but that's not a knock, just an observation. Everything runs great but it all ran great previously too. Funny thing about RAM, you only notice it if it fails or you don't have enough. You really only will notice the RAM upgrade if you're doing RAM intensive tasks like I do. I run drum VSTs with my Roland vDrum kit and the samples get loaded into RAM so that when you strike the drum pad, the sample comes out immediately with little to no latency. When I first started using drum VSTs years back, it was common to see kits max out at around 750mb - 1 gb, which was a lot as 4gb of RAM was the norm then. Now I've got VSTs where some of the presets are close to 8gb (Superior Stories comes to mind). I've also got 3 Roland kits combined so I have to add additional kit pieces on top of that, so I've got some kits that load up to 12gb into RAM. You need RAM above and beyond that in order to run the PC too. I'm constantly upgrading RAM to keep up with the progress and bloated sizes of VST samples in all things music production, so the 48gb upgrade from 32gb is welcome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent RAM, looks good, slightly expensive
reviews.reviewText: Great set of RAM that will be used in my next build. Crucial is a top tier brand, so there's usually a premium you need to pay. But regardless, 48GB DDR5 RAM with 6,000MT/s transfer rate really can't be beat. Really happy that I got the opportunity to try this out, and it booted right up in my test machine. Looks great took with the black aesthetic. Not much else to say - if you're in the market for this type of RAM then you can't go wrong with Crucial branded kits like this one. 5/5!

Crutial is the best in terms of quality but, there is a but... before buying i didnt look at all the spec sheet from the manufacturer and 6000mhz is pretty good but the timing is cl48 which is not what i expected.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bring your workspace to the next level
reviews.reviewText: Experience a revolutionary leap in desktop performance with the Crucial Pro RAM 48GB Kit (2x24GB) DDR5. Unleash the full potential of your desktop system with cutting-edge technology, lightning-fast speeds, and unparalleled reliability. Whether you're a professional multitasker, content creator, or a hardcore gamer, this memory kit is designed to elevate your computing experience to new heights.Key Features:Pros:Massive 48GB Kit for Multitasking Prowess:Pro: The 48GB Kit, consisting of two 24GB modules, provides an expansive memory capacity. Enjoy seamless multitasking, handle resource-intensive applications, and experience a significant boost in overall system responsiveness.DDR5 Technology for Unprecedented Speed:Pro: Embrace the future of memory technology with DDR5. The Crucial Pro RAM operates at mind-boggling speeds of 6000MT/s (or configurable to 5600MT/s, 5200MT/s, or 4800MT/s), ensuring data transfer rates that redefine desktop performance standards.Optimized for Desktop Systems:Pro: Tailored specifically for desktop systems, this RAM kit is optimized to deliver peak performance. Whether you're engaged in heavy multitasking or pushing your system to its limits with gaming or content creation, Crucial Pro RAM ensures a fluid and responsive experience.Reliability You Can Trust:Pro: Crucial is synonymous with reliability, and the Pro RAM series continues this legacy. Count on the stability and dependability of your system with memory modules engineered for long-term, high-performance use.Enhanced Productivity and Efficiency:Pro: Elevate your productivity levels and streamline your workflow. The Crucial Pro RAM enables faster data access and execution, reducing load times and enhancing overall system efficiency.Future-Ready Technology:Pro: DDR5 technology positions your system for the future. As software and applications continue to advance, your desktop will be ready to handle the demands of tomorrow's computing landscape.Cons:Compatibility Check Required:Con: Given the cutting-edge nature of DDR5 technology, users are advised to check compatibility with their existing systems. Ensure that your motherboard supports DDR5 memory modules before making a purchase.Conclusion:In conclusion, the Crucial Pro RAM 48GB Kit (2x24GB) DDR5 is a powerhouse memory solution that caters to the demands of modern computing. With its massive capacity, DDR5 technology, desktop optimization, reliability, enhanced productivity, and future-ready design, this RAM kit is a game-changer for users seeking top-tier performance. While compatibility checks are necessary, the overall package positions the Crucial Pro RAM as a must-have for those who demand nothing but the best from their desktop systems. Elevate your computing experience with Crucial Pro RAM and unlock a new realm of speed and efficiency.

reviews.reviewTitle: "The Cadillac of High Speed DDR Memory"
reviews.reviewText: This review evaluates the “CRUCIAL PRO RAM 48GB Kit (2x24GB) DDR5 6000MT/s Desktop Memory CP2K24G60C48U5” made by CRUCIAL.The product was shipped with no excessive or wasteful packaging. What’s in the box: two (2) 24GB DDR5 6000MT/s Desktop Memory modules.First impressions: I purchased this SSD module to complete my build of a high-end 3D CAD modeling and rendering desktop for my engineering business; this type of modeling is extremely CPU and memory extensive swallowing tons of bandwidth. I have been using CRUCIAL memory for 30 years and it NEVER disappoints. This memory uses the latest in cutting-edge technology (no surprise here) and incorporates an integrated aluminum heatsink spreader to dissipate generated heat under load. The cooler the electronics run, the more stable and have a greater effective service life.How did this product perform? Blazingly fast and rock stable. I dropped these two puppies into my ASUS ROG Maximus Z790 motherboard with zero compatibility issues. As advertised, you noticeably get almost double the bandwidth and speed over conventional DDR4 RAM which makes a huge difference in rendering in 3D models.Cost-effectiveness and value: Overall I am extremely satisfied with the product. At a current price of $225.99, I feel it is great value for the quality and functionality delivered. Some people may think that this is expensive but you get what you pay for if you want the best quality and superior reliability.In summary: the “CRUCIAL PRO RAM 48GB Kit (2x24GB) DDR5 6000MT/s Desktop Memory CP2K24G60C48U5” made by CRUCIAL is the “Cadillac of RAM”, dependable, blazingly fast, and most importantly stable under high transfer rates. You can rest assured that your product is supported by a leader in the memory business for over 45 years! I would definitely recommend this product without reservation.Pros 👍:✔ Supports 6000, 5600, 5200, or 4800MT/s.✔ Compatible with 12th Gen Intel Core or newer series of desktop CPUs.✔ Compatible with AMD Ryzen 7000 or newer series of desktop CPUs.✔ Intel XMP 3.0 and AMD EXPO are supported for easy performance recovery.✔ Integrated aluminum heat sink spreader to keep modules cooler.✔ Ultra FFFFFFAST! High transfer rates.✔ Dependable data transfers.✔ Limited lifetime warranty.✔ Excellent customer support with 45 years of experience in the memory business.✔ Fair price for upper-tier quality and performance delivered.Cons👎:✘ None!

As others have mentioned, this kit is on the slower side, CL48 is about 10% slower than CL36, imo, the difference is irrelevant as it’s on nanosecond level.I think this kit is only worth it when discounted to roughly the same price as a CL36 32GB kit. Otherwise, there are better and cheaper alternatives out there.

I upgraded my desktop with the Crucial Pro RAM 48GB Kit, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations on every level. This high-performance DDR5 memory kit offers exceptional speed and reliability, making it perfect for demanding tasks and resource-intensive applications.The build quality of the Crucial Pro RAM 48GB Kit is robust and reliable. The modules are meticulously designed, ensuring seamless integration into the motherboard slots without any compatibility issues. Additionally, the efficient heat spreaders provide outstanding heat dissipation, keeping the modules cool even during extended heavy workload sessions.Another aspect I appreciate about this RAM kit is the cutting-edge DDR5 technology. DDR5 memory brings a significant performance boost compared to its predecessors, offering faster data transfer rates and lower power consumption. This translates to improved efficiency and longevity, making the Crucial Pro RAM 48GB Kit an investment that will serve you well for years to come.In conclusion, the Crucial Pro RAM 48GB Kit is a remarkable piece of hardware that delivers unparalleled performance and speed. Whether you are a professional requiring optimal performance or an avid gamer seeking an exceptional experience, this memory kit will effortlessly cater to your needs. Combining cutting-edge DDR5 technology, impressive capacity, and a resilient build, it truly sets the bar high for desktop memory. I highly recommend the Crucial Pro RAM 48GB Kit without hesitation, and it easily deserves a perfect 5-star rating.
